name: add-wasm
description: Simple codebase for compiling an add function to WebAssembly with jco

scripts.build: jco componentize add.mjs --wit wit/component.wit --world-name component --out add.wasm --disable all
scripts.transpile: jco transpile add.wasm -o dist/transpiled && cp dist/transpiled/add.js dist/transpiled/add.mjs
